summary: 12 year old Lily Bobbit moves to Medda, Ala, and immediately makes an impression on the residents when she and her friends team up to outsmart a con man, the town is changed forever.
cast: Sheryl Lee|Christopher McDonald|Tom Arnold|Joe Pichler|Tania Raymonde|Jesse Plemons|Phyllis Frelich|Brazhal Brewer|Marilyn Dodds Frank|Ritch Brinkley|Lucina Paquet|Paul Quaintance|Caitlin Collins|Emily Clibourn|Cynthia Baker|Weston Mueller|Phillip Dawkins|John Judd|Joe Van Slyke|Freeman Coffey|Lettie Frances Walton|Bobby Harrison|Tom Brainard|Lara Myrene|Susan Coolidge|Don Groves|Erin Guinn|Jessica Medoff|Leslie Whistler|Harve Kolzow|Frank Novak|Rachel Harrison|Alexander Piccolo|Kyran Hicks|Khallid Shabazz|Evelyn Linford|Natalie Higgins|Michael Bunchman|Debra Marks|Barbara Bushman|Susan Donahue|John Madden|Natalie M Higgins|Mark G. Pavuk|Megan Frances|Lisa Marie Quillinan
title: Children on Their Birthdays
